value: Corrective distal radius osteotomy following fracture malunion using a fixed-angle volar locking plate

value: Corrective osteotomy with a fixed-angle volar locking plate is a safe and reliable surgical technique for malunited distal radius fractures, resulting in improved patient function and radiological alignment with no complications.
